name: MicrosoftStoreWin32Submissions
description: Microsoft Store Task for submitting updates to Win32 Apps
author: Microsoft

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: The type of Store Application. Available options are: `packaged` or `win32`
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of Store Application. Available options are: `packaged` or `win32`

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: The command to execute. Available command: `configure`, `get`, `update`, `poll`, or `publish`.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The command to execute. Available command: `configure`, `get`, `update`, `poll`, or `publish`.

inputs.name: moduleName
inputs.label: Indicates which module should be queried from the current draft (listing, properties or availability)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates which module should be queried from the current draft (listing, properties or availability)

inputs.name: listingLanguage
inputs.label: Indicates which listing language should be queries from the current draft
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates which listing language should be queries from the current draft

inputs.name: productUpdate
inputs.label: The Json to upload the package data
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Json to upload the package data

inputs.name: pollingSubmissionId
inputs.label: The Id of the active submission being processed
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Id of the active submission being processed
